import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const MoviesList = () => { const {data, error, isError, isLoading } = useQuery('movies', getAllMovies) // first argument is a string to cache and track the query result if(isLoading){ return
Loading...
} if(isError){ return
Error! {error.message}
} return (
id name rating time delete update
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
) } export default MoviesList
